    • Method Detail

      • hasGradientColor

        public boolean hasGradientColor()
        If bar has gradient fill color defined.
        Returns:
        true if gradient fill property defined.

      • getGradientColors

        public int[] getGradientColors()
        Retrieve set of colors defining the gradient of bar's fill. Gradient fill property must have been previously defined.
        Returns:
        Gradient colors array.

      • getGradientPositions

        public float[] getGradientPositions()
        Retrieve set of positions to define the gradient of bar's fill. Gradient fill property must have been previously defined.
        Returns:
        Gradient positions.

      • setGradientColor

        public Bar setGradientColor(@NonNull
                            int[] colors,
                            float[] positions)
        Set gradient colors to the fill of the Bar.
        Parameters:
        colors - The colors to be distributed among gradient
        positions - Position/order from which the colors will be place
        Returns:
        Bar self-reference.
